entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023
